description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国工农红军第二十六军

zh-cn: 中国工农红军第二十六军

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的一支部队。
description.en: A unit of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在抗日战争时期创建的第一个敌后抗日根据地。
description.en: The first anti-Japanese base area established by the Communist Party of China behind enemy lines during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会负责农村工作的职能部门。
description.en: The functional department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for rural work.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的派出机构。
description.en: A dispatched agency of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间陕西省的权力机构。
description.en: The organ of power in Shaanxi Province during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在甘肃省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Gansu Province.

description.zh-cn: 甘肃省人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Gansu Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 甘肃省的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of Gansu Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会

description.zh-cn: 1982年至1992年间中国共产党设立的作为高级领导人政治顾问的机构。
description.en: An institution of the Communist Party of China that existed from 1982 to 1992 to serve as a political advisory body for senior leaders.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任甘肃省省长。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China, former Governor of Gansu Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任甘肃省省长。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China, former Governor of Gansu Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国性组织。
description.en: The national organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 李登瀛出生于陕西神木。
description.en: Li Dengying was born in Shenmu, Shaanxi.

description.zh-cn: 李登瀛是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Li Dengying was a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国工农红军第二十六军

description.zh-cn: 早年担任中国工农红军红二十六军经理处处长等职务。
description.en: In his early years, he served as the Director of the Management Office of the 26th Army of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

position.zh-cn: 五地委书记兼军分区政委
position.en: Secretary of the Fifth Prefectural Committee and Political Commissar of the Military Sub-district

description.zh-cn: 1939年，任中共右山怀县委书记、朔县县委书记，后改任晋察冀边区五地委书记兼军分区政委。
description.en: In 1939, he served as Secretary of the Youshanhuai County Committee and Shuo County Committee of the CPC, and was later reassigned as Secretary of the Fifth Prefectural Committee and Political Commissar of the Military Sub-district of the Jin-Cha-Ji Border Region.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

position.en: Deputy Director of the Rural Office

description.zh-cn: 1979年兼任甘肃省人大常委会副主任，1983年担任第六届甘肃省人大常委会主任。
description.en: In 1979, he concurrently served as Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Gansu Provincial People's Congress, and in 1983, he became the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Sixth Gansu Provincial People's Congress.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会

description.zh-cn: 李登瀛接替冯纪新出任甘肃省人民政府省长。
description.en: Li Dengying succeeded Feng Jixin as the Governor of the Gansu Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 李登瀛的甘肃省人民政府省长职务由陈光毅接任。
description.en: Chen Guangyi succeeded Li Dengying as the Governor of the Gansu Provincial People's Government.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 李登瀛曾担任第二届、第三届、第四届全国政协委员。
description.en: Li Dengying served as a member of the Second, Third, and Fourth National Committees of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 李登瀛是第六届全国人大代表。
description.en: Li Dengying was a deputy to the Sixth National People's Congress.
